trans-unit.source: Represents the International Color Consortium (ICC) or Image Color Management (ICM) color profile that is associated with a bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: Representa o perfil de cor ICC (International Color Consortium) ou ICM (Gerenciamento de cores de imagem) que está associado uma imagem de bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The supported standard color spaces are sRGB, ScRGB, RGB, CMYK, Gray, Multichannel, and unknown.
trans-unit.target: Os espaços de cores padrão com suporte são sRGB, ScRGB, RGB, CMYK, cinza, multicanal e desconhecido.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to get the color profile that is associated with a bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como obter o perfil de cor que está associado uma imagem de bitmap.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that identifies the location of the desired color profile.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> que identifica o local do perfil de cor desejado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile located at a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> com o perfil de cor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] localizado em um determinado <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.

trans-unit.source: To use any of the unsupported color profiles, you must install one and use its URI to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para usar qualquer um dos perfis de cor sem suporte, você deve instalar um e usar seu URI para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" /> from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> is derived.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" /> do qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> é derivado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> with the standard color profile (sRGB or RGB ) that most closely matches the supplied <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> com o perfil de cor padrão (sRGB ou RGB) que mais se aproxima do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" /> fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to construct a new instance of <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar uma nova instância da <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <see cref="T:System.Object" /> a comparar quanto à igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> é igual a uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the supplied <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Object" /> fornecido é igual a esta instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o código hash para esta instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that represents the hash code for the object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> que representa o código hash para o objeto.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Operates on two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> to determine equality.
trans-unit.target: Opera em duas instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> para determinar igualdade.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Operates on two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> to determine that they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Opera em duas instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> para determinar que elas não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> não forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a readable <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> of raw color profile data.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> legível dos dados brutos de perfil de cor.

trans-unit.source: A readable <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> of raw color profile data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> legível dos dados brutos de perfil de cor.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that represents the location of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> que representa o local de um perfil de cor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that represents the location of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> que representa o local de um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] perfil de cor.
